shortDescription: Property Labels & Card System Refinements (82 files)
problem: Domain cards and property labels needed refinements for consistency and cleaner architecture.
cause: Ongoing enterprise centralization effort - improving card system and component structure.

solution.phase1: Refined all 7 domain card components (Building, Contact, Parking, Project, Property, Storage, Unit)
solution.phase2: Improved property labels and utility functions
solution.phase3: Simplified page headers and content components
solution.phase4: Cleaned up component architecture across building-management, contacts, projects

notes: Component cleanup: Simplified headers and content
